backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that Schedule.tsx displays events running until midnight (00:00) for Day 1 and Day 2, with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing a gaming LAN party site with navigation, schedule, tickets, support, and contact pages using cartoon/neon styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with CSS custom properties defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Shark LAN application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining five routes (Home, Tickets, Schedule, Support, Contact) with shared Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, animated heart icon, and caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing Navigation header, main content outlet, and Footer with gradient background.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header with Shark LAN branding, gamepad icon, and five navigation tabs with active state highlighting and neon glow effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing authenticated/anonymous actor creation with Internet Identity integration and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file as the backend has no methods to call for this static landing page.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with OKLCH color system for neon gaming theme, custom cartoon text effects, neon glow shadows, and keyframe animations (float, wiggle, pulse-glow, bounce-slow).
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying venue location, address, email, phone contact information, and a stylized map placeholder with cartoon-themed styling and neon effects.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring hero banner with shark mascot, event highlights (high energy, 50 players, prizes), and a cheering crowd image, all with animated cartoon styling.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Schedule page with day selector (Day 1/Day 2) showing tournament timelines for various games (Fortnite, Valorant, League of Legends, etc.) and a list of featured games.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Support center page with section selector for FAQ, rules, troubleshooting, and contact form, providing help resources for event attendees.
frontend/src/pages/Tickets.tsx: Tickets page displaying three tier options (Bronze, Silver, Gold Shark) with pricing, features, and BYO PC/console information for the 50-player capacity event.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended animations (accordion), custom shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a Shark LAN gaming event website with multi-tab navigation (Home, Tickets, Schedule/Events, Support, Contact/Location) and animated/cartoon styling. Contains architectural notes, existing features with requirement IDs, and version tracking for a vibrant teen-friendly design with neon color palette.
